DialogueOption.Text: Mica wanted me to ask why it's taken so long for sand to start flowing back to the other twin.
Um, how much longer do you think it'd take for sand to flow back to Ash Twin now?

Dialogue.Page: ..What? Who cares about that now?! Everything's.. everything's about to...!
I hope they at least got to see it, before everything ends...
What? I.. I don't know! Not.. Not long. But..
More importantly, it's.. It's about to happen already... Oh...
